Overall, it was the team's 114th season playing in a division of English [[Association football|football]], most of which have been spent in the top flight. == Season review == {{Empty section | date=January 2011}} == Team kit == For this season the shirt sponsor for all of the club's kits continued to be the previous season's sponsor, [[Thomas Cook Group|Thomas Cook]], while the team kits
